title: Sri Lanka increases fuel prices after Cabinet approves pricing formula
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has decided to revise fuel Prices with effect from Tuesday (24) 3 AM.
Minister Kanchana Wijesekera tweeted that the Fuel pricing formula that was approved by the cabinet was applied to revise the prices.
Sri Lanka increases fuel prices after Cabinet approves pricing formula
